title: Emergency
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Leading me on, it's a false alarm
I be here in your arms, but you're long gone
Whispers in your ear, do I turn you on?
Even though you ain't here, I'm the one you call on
[Pre-Chorus]
And now you're calling me back
But it's too late now, late now, late now
[Chorus]
The red light shines, warning signs
And it remind me of you
The sirens cry when you're nearby
'Cause baby that's what you do
[Post-Chorus]
I know you know, I need you to go gome
And leave me all alone, emergency
I know you know, I need you to go gome
And leave me all alone, emergency
[Verse 2]
Leading me on, it's a false alarm
I be here in your arms, but you're long gone
Whispers in your ear, do I turn you on?
Even though you ain't here, I'm the one you call on

[Pre-Chorus]
And now you're calling me back
But it's too late now, late now, late now
[Chorus]
The red light shines, warning signs
And it remind me of you
The sirens cry when you're nearby
'Cause baby that's what you do
[Post-Chorus]
I know you know, I need you to go gome
And leave me all alone, emergency
I know you know, I need you to go gome
And leave me all alone, emergency
[Chorus]
The red light shines, warning signs
And it remind me of you
The sirens cry when you're nearby
'Cause baby that's what you do
The red light shines, warning signs
And it remind me of you
The sirens cry when you're nearby
'Cause baby that's what you do

[Post-Chorus]
I know you know, I need you to go gome
And leave me all alone, emergency
I know you know, I need you to go gome
And leave me all alone, emergency
